item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi, I’m Ian Mckay (aka @m1thryn). I’m an experienced Security Researcher working at the intersection of Network Security, Machine Learning, and Detection Engineering. I run this blog as an outlet for research, a way to continue learning, and, hopefully, as a way to give back to give something back to the security community.

Contact Me:

  • Twitter
  • Github
  • Email
